Navigate to 'https://example.com/dashboard'
Verify the header has background color #1A1A1A and height 64px
Verify child navigation links display 'Home', 'Analytics', 'Settings' with font size 16px and color #FFFFFF
Verify on focus, each navigation link transitions its background color to #333333 over 200ms, has 12px horizontal padding, and content alignment is centered

Verify the 'Add to Cart' button displays text 'Add to Cart', has background color #007bff, text color #FFFFFF, font size 18px, font weight 600, border radius 4px, width 200px, height 48px, is enabled with opacity 1, and has 16px top margin
Locate the email input field

Verify its placeholder text is 'Enter your email', has 1px solid border with color #CCCCCC, border radius 4px, width 300px, height 40px, current value is empty, and aria-label is 'Email address input'
Verify on focus, the email input field border color changes to #007bff and background color becomes #F0F8FF

Verify the main product image source is 'image_product_1.jpg', rendered dimensions are 800x600px, natural dimensions are 1200x900px, alt text is 'Premium Blue Shirt', loads successfully within 500ms, and displays a 'Demo' watermark at x 10px, y 10px
Play the embedded video
Verify the video player source is 'video_promo.mp4', width 640px, height 360px, starts muted by default, and has initial opacity 1
Verify entering fullscreen mode triggers a 300ms transition
Verify the search results list displays exactly 10 items
Verify each item's title text has font size 16px and color #333333
Verify each list item has 10px vertical padding, 15px horizontal padding, 8px bottom margin, and is visible
Click 'Delete Account'

Verify the confirmation modal appears visible with width 400px, height 250px, background color #FFFFFF, border radius 8px, centered at x 50%, y 50% with opacity 1, and displays the text 'Are you sure you want to delete your account?'
Locate the 'Forgot Password?' link
Verify its text is 'Forgot Password?', color #007bff, font size 14px, font weight 400, positioned 10px from top and 20px from right of its parent container, and label is 'Forgot Password link'
Verify on focus, its color changes to #0056b3 over 150ms

Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox has associated label 'Remember Me', is not selected by default, is enabled, has width 16px, height 16px, 1px solid border color #777777, background color #FFFFFF, and 5px right margin
Interact with the language selector dropdown

Verify its initial value is 'en', contains 3 options, has width 150px, height 36px, 1px solid border color #AAAAAA, background color #F8F8F8, font size 14px, text color #333333, and displays 'English' as its placeholder when nothing is selected
Verify the first row of the user data table contains 5 cells and its top-left corner is at x 20px, y 100px
Verify each cell has background color #F2F2F2, text color #444444, font size 15px, 12px padding, 1px bottom border color #E0E0E0, and text align left
Locate the search icon next to the search bar
Verify its width is 24px, height is 24px, color is #666666, is an SVG, visible, has no alt text, and is vertically aligned with the text input field
Start a file upload
Verify the progress bar has value 0% initially, width 300px, height 8px, and background color #E0E0E0
Verify as it progresses, the inner bar color changes to #28a745, smoothly animating its width to reflect the current value, with border radius 4px
Scroll the sidebar navigation down
Verify its scroll-top position is 200px and scroll-left is 0px
Verify the sidebar has fixed height of 400px, background color #F9F9F9, 1px right border color #DDDDDD, 15px padding, width 250px, and opacity 1
Hover over the help icon

Verify the tooltip becomes visible, displays the text 'Contact support for assistance.', has background color #333333, text color #FFFFFF, font size 12px, border radius 4px, 8px padding, and appears at x 100px, y 50px relative to the icon
Click the date input field
Verify its initial date value is today's date, current value is empty, placeholder is 'YYYY-MM-DD', width 180px, height 36px, 1px solid border color #CCCCCC, font size 14px, and text color #333333
Verify on focus, the date input field border color changes to #009688
Submit the form

Verify the success notification banner appears visible with text 'Your changes have been saved.', background color #D4EDDA, text color #155724, 16px padding, 20px top margin, animated by sliding down from the top over 300ms, and height of 50px

Verify the user's avatar source is 'avatar_user.png', rendered dimensions are 48x48px, shape is circular, has 2px solid border color #007bff, border radius 50%, alt text is 'User Profile Picture', loads within 150ms, and is positioned at x 10px, y 10px
Scroll to the bottom of the page

Verify the footer has background color #333333, height 100px, displays copyright text '© 2023 Company Name', with font size 14px, color #FFFFFF, 20px vertical padding, text align center, positioned at bottom 0, with 100% width, and is visible
Click the 'Settings' tab

Verify the 'Settings' tab is active/selected, has background color #FFFFFF, text color #000000, 2px solid border bottom color #007bff, 10px vertical padding, font weight 600, positioned at x 100px, and has width of 120px
Verify the 'Login' button is visible, centered horizontally at y=450px, with width 120px, height 48px, background color #007bff, text 'Login', font size 16px, font weight 600, and border radius 8px
Verify the 'Login' button transitions background color in 300ms on hover

Verify the user profile image source is 'avatar.jpg', natural dimensions 200x200px, rendered dimensions 60x60px, loads within 150ms, is circular (border radius 50%), and has alt text 'User profile picture'
Confirm the main product title displays the text 'Luxury Smartwatch X1', font family 'Roboto', font size 28px, color #333333, top position 100px, left 50px, and margin-bottom 20px
Verify the 'Search' input field displays 'Enter product name...' as placeholder, has 1px solid border color #cccccc, background color #ffffff, 12px horizontal padding, and font size 14px
Verify the 'Search' input field becomes focused with 2px blue outline on click
Validate the shopping cart icon displays a count of '3' items, has aria-label 'Shopping Cart with 3 items', is visible, positioned at x 95% and y 20px, with color #ff0000
Verify the video player is visible, has source 'promo_video.mp4', is initially muted, positioned at 20px from top and 20px from right, with width 640px, height 360px, and supports fullscreen mode
Check that the 'Add to Cart' button, when disabled, has opacity 0.6, background color #cccccc, text 'Add to Cart', color #999999, and is not clickable
Confirm the footer copyright text '© 2023 Company Name' has font size 12px, font family 'Arial', text align 'center', color #666666, and 20px vertical padding
Validate the product description panel has 24px padding on all sides, background color #f9f9f9, border radius 10px, and width 700px
Validate the text 'Product Description' has color #444444 and font size 15px
Ensure the 'Next Page' pagination link is enabled, has text 'Next', font weight 500, color #007bff, and border 1px solid #007bff
Ensure the 'Next Page' pagination link transitions color in 200ms on hover

Verify the alert banner is visible for 5 seconds after an action, has background color #D4EDDA, text 'Item added successfully', font size 16px, color #155724, 16px padding, 20px top margin, animated by sliding down from the top over 300ms, and height of 50px
Check the selected navigation item 'Home' has background color #f0f0f0, font weight 700, color #333333, 15px padding-left, and is marked as active with 2px left border color #007bff
Confirm the date picker input field has placeholder 'Select a date', value '2023-10-27' when selected, border 1px solid #ced4da, width 200px, and font size 14px
Validate the modal overlay has opacity 0.7, background color #000000, covers the full viewport (x=0, y=0, width=100%, height=100%), and appears with an animation taking 300ms
Ensure the product image gallery contains a count of 5 images
Ensure each image has rendered dimensions 100x100px, a 'New Product' watermark positioned at the top-right corner, border radius 4px, and alt text 'Product image gallery item'
Verify the 'Subscribe' button remains visible and centered during a vertical scroll, always positioned 50px from the bottom of the viewport, with background color #28a745 and text 'Subscribe'
Check that the footer links (e.g., 'About Us') are left-aligned within their container, have font size 14px, font family 'Helvetica', color #007bff, 10px right margin, and 5px padding on all sides
Confirm the 'Delete' icon is visible, has width 24px, height 24px, and aria-label 'Delete item'
Confirm when focused, the 'Delete' icon shows 2px solid red border #dc3545 and becomes focused via a transition taking 150ms
Validate the main content area has minimum width of 960px, 30px padding on left and right, background color #ffffff, and ensures horizontal scroll is absent when viewport width is 1200px
Validate its child text content has color #333333 and font family 'Open Sans'
Ensure the 'Upload File' button is enabled, has text 'Upload File', background color #6c757d, color #ffffff, border radius 4px, font weight 600, and height is 40px

Verify the 'Shop Now' button is visible, has width 150px, height 50px, background color rgb(255,100,0), text color #ffffff, font size 18px, font family 'Arial', border radius 8px, and padding 12px 24px
Confirm that on focus, its background color changes to rgb(200,80,0) with a transition duration of 300ms
Open 'https://www.demostore.com/login'

Verify the 'Email Address' input field displays 'user@example.com' as its placeholder, has initial value '', is enabled, shows 1px solid border in #cccccc, background color #f9f9f9, font size 16px, font family 'Helvetica', and its aria-label is 'Email input field'

Verify the 'Error Message' element is visible, displays text 'Invalid input. Please check your details.', text color #ff0000, font size 14px, font weight 500, and is positioned at left 20px and top 10px relative to the input field
